summary: A VPS/hosting management system with machine OS tracking (Windows/Ubuntu), connection instructions (SSH/RDP), and client plan management with expiration dates
architectural_notes: Context-sensitive connection instructions based on OS
Client plan management with expiration tracking

existing_features.title: Update the client registration form in the admin panel to include a dropdown for selecting operating system (Windows or Ubuntu) and a date picker for setting the plan expiration date
Update the client edit modal in the admin panel to allow editing the operating system and plan expiration date fields
Display SSH connection instructions on the client dashboard when the operating system is Ubuntu, including a mini explanation with the command format and connection steps
Display RDP connection instructions on the client dashboard when the operating system is Windows, including a mini explanation with the connection steps and how to use Remote Desktop
Display the client's plan name and expiration date in the user profile section on the client dashboard, showing the expiration date in a readable format

new_feature_requests.summary: Add OS field (Windows/Ubuntu) to machine registration
Display SSH connection instructions for Ubuntu machines
Display RDP connection instructions for Windows machines
Show plan and expiration date in user profile
Add plan and expiration date fields to client registration in admin panel
Add operating system field (Windows or Ubuntu) to the client record data model in the backend, storing it as a variant type with options for Windows and Ubuntu
Add plan expiration date field to the client record data model in the backend, storing it as a timestamp or date value

projectName: Add OS tracking, connection instructions, and plan management with expiration dates
